channel.title: Death cape V1!
channel.description:
I was thinking to myself after my last post. what could i do next. then ive remembered talk of pvp cape.
Well here it is. the death cape awarded to those pleayer that kill others alot!!
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/DEathcape-1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/DEathcape-1.png[/img]
Credits: 70% jagex for cape base, 30% for me for adding skull to it and recoulouring.
Thanks, Buddy
www.buddyscape.webs.com

item.title: Death cape V1!
item.description:
@14-08 wrote:

ya but i hate giving my self credit for anything none the less. i really dont care who gets credited. as long as it prevents me from getting in trouble. lol

Hehe… That’s why I don’t post any of my models:

  1. Because half of them are bad recolors that look horrible in game. 

  2. Because 95% of my models suck.

  3. Because I don't want to get criticized - even if it is constructive criticism.

Read full topic

item.title: Death cape V1!
item.dc:creator: @Buddy_budster Buddy_budster
item.description:
@Buddy_budster wrote:

rip4d:

I suppose it’s decent for a recolor, but move away from them. People who do recolors WILL get flamed as they always do.

ya i really do not like doing recoulours personally i think it takes the fun outa modeling but as for this model i think its a decent recoulour and was actually interesting to make.

14-08:

[quote]I suppose it’s decent for a recolor, but move away from them. People who do recolors WILL get flamed as they always do.

I agree. But, I personally don’t see anything wrong with people releasing ‘nice’ recolors, as long as they don’t give themselves 60% credit, for example. But I can understand when people who release recolors or show-off recolors get flamed.[/quote]

ya but i hate giving my self credit for anything none the less. i really dont care who gets credited. as long as it prevents me from getting in trouble. lol

Read full topic

item.title: Death cape V1!
item.description:
@14-08 wrote:

I suppose it's decent for a recolor, but move away from them. People who do recolors WILL get flamed as they always do.

I agree. But, I personally don’t see anything wrong with people releasing ‘nice’ recolors, as long as they don’t give themselves 60% credit, for example. But I can understand when people who release recolors or show-off recolors get flamed.

Read full topic

item.title: Death cape V1!
item.description:
@14-08 wrote:

I really don’t like it… I mean, the only thing that might take a bit of effort is the skull. And the skull is pretty bad… But still better than what I can do.
